head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths COOKE, HONORABLE LAWRENCE H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths COOKE, HONORABLE LAWRENCE H.

block.p: COOKE-Honorable Lawrence H. We express our condolences to the family of Honorable Lawrence H. Cooke. Our entire community feels this great loss. Jack & Shirley Ingber and Keith & Pamela Ingber

COOKE-Lawrence H. The citizens of New York will continue to benefit for years to come from the dedicated service of this wise and decent man whose every act as Chief Judge of the State of NY was rooted in his belief that ''the courts belong to the people.'' S. Michael Nadel
